document_data.mainbody:
lim Jhasso was a minor noble of the Jhasso family in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , the Jhasso family was on the verge of bankruptcy as their trading coster was struggling and they had very little money. To add more bad luck, Klim was abducted while walking in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate by Dead Three cultists. While imprisoned within the cults lair in the city, he was tortured by Ygnath while Kazzira watched.
